Text: As already mentioned, it would be really dandy and swell, if some kind person would find it in his or her heart to seed this album for a nanosecond or two.

I've got this album, but didn't grab it from this torrent. Have uploaded it here for you guys and gals: http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3945017

Don't be a tight arse - seed for a while after downloading it to help other's with their download. Recommended ratio of 2, please.

Somebody seed please.

We're stuck at 99.6%. This way, there are glithes in the first track.

Thx in advance!

I took the liberty to upload the Basique track (which will upload all but a bit of the track):

did everyone get stuck the same place as I - 99.6%?  For the love of Pete, please seed!
